issue.title: [C++] Move implementations in arrow/ipc/test-common.h into libarrow_testing
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4904](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4904). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Instead of having these all defined as `static inline` we should move the implementations into a testing support library.
